data.name: Castles Route
data.description: The Castles Route takes you past some beautiful castles and historic estates. Enjoy the green surroundings and discover the rich history of the region.

reviews.comment: Very nice and interesting walk. Also doable with children. The alternation of history and culture with nature is very nice.
Too bad not everything was feasible with a wheelchair while it says here that it is a paved walk.

data.name: Historical City Walk
data.description: The Historical City Walk takes you through the beautiful streets and alleys of Ghent. Discover the rich history and admire the historic buildings and monuments.

data.name: Nature Park Brielmeersen
data.description: The Nature Park route takes you through the beautiful Brielmeersen nature park and green landscapes around Deinze. Enjoy the tranquillity and discover the diversity of flora and fauna.

reviews.comment: A relaxing experience! The hiking trails in Brielmeersen Nature Park are well maintained and offer an excellent opportunity to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The park has a varied environment with lush green areas, picturesque ponds and an abundance of flora and fauna. A perfect place for nature lovers and photographers!

Family-friendly walks! Brielmeersen Nature Park is ideal for families looking for a fun and educational day in nature. There are special child-friendly trails with information boards describing local animals and plants. Children can enjoy the playgrounds and interactive zones, while parents can enjoy the peaceful surroundings.

A paradise for bird lovers! If you are a bird lover, a walk in Brielmeersen Nature Park is an absolute must. The park is home to a wide variety of bird species, including waterbirds, songbirds and birds of prey. There are viewpoints and observation huts scattered throughout the park, allowing you to get a closer look at the birds. Don't forget your binoculars!

data.name: City Walk
data.description: The City Walk leads you through the picturesque streets of Maldegem. Discover the town's historic buildings, bridges and lively atmosphere.

reviews.comment: The city walk in Maldegem is a fascinating exploration through charming streets and historic squares. You will be amazed by the beautiful architecture and rich history this city has to offer. Highly recommended for lovers of culture and history!

data.name: Old bare valley
data.description: The Old bare valley walking route takes you through the flat country fields of Merendree and Lovendegem. In wet weather, be sure to provide appropriate footwear. Through the fields meanders the stream Old bare(Oude Kale in Dutch). This was once a river connected to the Poekebeek and the Durme, which thus flowed into the Scheldt.

reviews.comment: An enchanting walk along the Old bare Valley in Vinderhoute. Beautiful scenery, babbling brooks and serene tranquillity make this route perfect for nature lovers.
A scenic hike. Breathtaking views, lush green surroundings and a feeling of total relaxation. A great escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
A lovely walk , the paths are well maintained and the route is well marked. Enjoy the natural beauty and listen to the soothing sound of running water.

A disappointing hike along the Old bare Valley. The paths were muddy and poorly maintained, making it difficult to walk. Moreover, there were few interesting sights along the route. Not worth the effort.

data.name: Roger Raveel Walking Route
data.description: A short 3.7-kilometre walk through the village of Machelen-aan-de-Leie. This hike focuses on the artist Roger Raveel.  You start at the Roger Raveel Museum, with a nearby car park. During this walk, you will discover beautiful spots where you can see the works of the painter Roger Raveel.

reviews.comment: The hiking trail is a true artistic discovery. The trail is a real artistic discovery. It is a unique and inspiring walking experience, combining beautiful works of art with picturesque landscapes.
A cultural gem! The Roger Raveel Walking Route in Machelen-on-the-Lys offers a fascinating mix of art and nature. An absolute must-visit for art lovers who want to enjoy a refreshing walk.

data.name: Green Belt
data.description: The Green Belt walk takes you through the beautiful green countryside around Brussels. Enjoy the quiet paths, forests and parks while escaping the hustle and bustle of the city.

reviews.comment: A beautiful walk around Brussels with lots of greenery and nature. Perfect to escape the city bustle for a while and enjoy the fresh air.
The Green Belt walk is a great way to enjoy the nature around Brussels. The paths are well maintained and there are many beautiful places to discover. Highly recommended for hiking enthusiasts!

data.name: Dunes Walk
data.description: The Dunes Walk takes you through the beautiful dune landscapes of De Panne. Enjoy the vast sand dunes, fresh sea air and views of the North Sea.

reviews.comment: A fantastic walk through the dunes of De Panne. The view of the sea and the sand dunes is breathtaking. Highly recommended for nature lovers!
Beautiful nature, refreshing walk and the ideal location for a day by the sea. The dune walk in De Panne is highly recommended!

data.name: Sonian Forest
data.description: The walk through the Sonian Forest offers an escape from the hustle and bustle of the city and takes you into the serene beauty of this beautiful forest area. Enjoy the quiet paths, dense forests and rich biodiversity.

data.name: Coastal Path
data.description: The Coastal Path is a scenic walking route along Ostend's beautiful coastline. Enjoy the view of the sea, the fresh sea air and the lively atmosphere of the city.

reviews.comment: A breathtaking walk along the coast of Ostend. The views are simply spectacular, especially at sunset. A perfect place to relax and enjoy the beauty of the sea.

The Coastal Path offers a fantastic walking experience with stunning views of the North Sea. The route is well maintained and there are plenty of places to rest and enjoy the scenery. Highly recommended for beach lovers!

data.name: Heuvelland
data.description: The Heuvelland walk takes you through the rolling countryside around Ypres. Discover the beautiful hills, picturesque villages and historical sights.

reviews.comment: A beautiful and challenging walking route through the Heuvelland region. The scenery is breathtaking and there are many interesting sights along the way. Make sure you take plenty of time to enjoy the views!
Heuvelland is a great place to hike. The route offers a mix of natural beauty and historical sites. The hills can be challenging at times, but the views are absolutely worth it.

data.name: Kalmthoutse Heide
data.description: The walk through the Kalmthoutse Heide takes you through a beautiful nature reserve with vast heathlands, forests and fens. Enjoy the tranquillity and discover the unique flora and fauna.

reviews.comment: A great hike for adventurous nature lovers. The Kalmthoutse Heide offers beautiful surroundings and the route offers plenty of challenge. Just make sure you wear good walking shoes!
The hike was a unique experience. The scenery is breathtaking and the route is well laid out. It is the perfect way to explore the natural beauty of the Kalmthoutse Heide.
